about_the_game:
When Lauren finds irregularities in the company accounts all evidence points to her morally bankrupt colleague, Vicki. When she confronts her, Vicki threatens to seduce Lauren’s son and ruin his life in retaliation.

Despite trying to warn him of Vicki’s ulterior motives, her son is hopelessly naive and begins falling for the Milf’s attentions.

In a moment of desperation, Lauren finds herself having to take drastic measures to keep her son’s attention focused on her. Every time she thinks she has secured his interest, Vicki ups her antics.

Lauren now finds herself at a crossroads.

Will she continue to try and compete with Vicki, corrupting herself in the process? Or will she give up on trying to save her son and watch him stolen away in an NTR story?

Guide her through her choices, help her save her son. Unfold her story and enjoy juicy and sexy content along with high quality animations in this Visual Novel story about maternal love, lust, and seduction.

The game is an interactive visual novel with high-quality renders and animations, choices that will affect the captivating story, and multiple endings. The game also features incest, corruption, and NTR themes, experienced from the perspective of a female protagonist.
Gameplay is broken down into days, where you will be trying to balance being a loving, caring mother to your son, while also being seductive enough to keep him away from Vicki. Failing to maintain a careful balance could see Lauren’s son stolen away… or Lauren becoming corrupted into a bimbo.
